entry.title: Between pride and the batcave
entry.summary:
Author: Shumagic

Summary: There's a contingency plan for any situation or superhero, because he's Batman, the dark knight, the best detective, the vigilante, the sugar baby, the night itse-... Wait what?Or, what happens when a sleep deprived Bruce fucks up and doesn't have a contingent plan for his own stupidity?

  • Everyone is horny for Bruce but considering his fame and public persona we cannot judge
  • I have no idea where this story is going btw
  • We know no consistency like Argentinian economy so beware
  • This idea has been rotating like a rotisserie chicken in my mind for so fucking long
  • I curse all the fucking time so I'll be projecting that on the characters you've been warned
  • Fluff and Humor
  • This world is chaos and I'm the god that unleashed it
  • Dick is bisexual because COME ON HE'S THE MOST BISEXUAL CHARACTER OF ALL THE BATKIDS
  • Everyone's age is as weirdly fucked up as in canon
  • Could be ooc but considering there's decades of comics great series and movies
  • along with some truly awful ones and infinite universes it might as well be canon
  • I'm more familiar with Dick Jason Barbara and Tim than I'm with Cass Stephanie Damian and Luke
  • so I apologise in advance if I mix up or fuck up something (but do let me know!)
  • This is full of shenanigans and a lot of second hand embarrassment
  • (If it's towards the characters or towards me it's up to you to decide lol)
  • Jason's Lazarus pitt related stuff is mostly hc I have but kind of mix with canon
  • (the canon part being he was in there)
  • This is the sum of an idiotic plot full of questionable decisions idiotic behaviour and situations
  • If idiocy is not your thing the walk away buddy
  • BUT if that's the kind of thing you're into then buckle up you're up to so much weird stupidity
  • For plot wise reasons all of Bruce's cell brains have abandoned the planet
  • and now he has to survive my imagination with the only one he has left (let the hunger games begin)
  • There probably won't be any smut because I'm ace
  • and my lack of penis could end up as an obstacle in my writing
  • HOWEVER I do have an extensive theoretical knowledge on the matter
  • so you can have some hope or proceed with caution

entry.title: It must have been love (But it's over now)
entry.summary:
Author: that_crazy_gal

Summary: Whoever thought it would be a great plan to emotionally manipulate a superpowered alien into thinking you loved him for extracting out his weaknesses in the off chance that he turns into a raging tyrant hell bent on world domination? Or in other words, Bruce Wayne deals with the consequences of his actions. If only it were as easy as he had originally thought it to be.[Drabble based on tumblr post]

entry.title: Batman v Superman: World’s Finest
entry.summary:
Author: legobiwan

Summary: Two of the world's greatest heroes are in the early days of their careers and meet each other as rivals. But when a common enemy threatens their way of life, they are forced to work together in order to save Earth and become the men they are destined to be. Batman and Superman must work together as a team to stop an enemy whose wealth and intelligence can win the battle alone.

entry.title: DCU Requests
entry.summary:
Author: Simping4ever_lol

Summary: Basically the Title, I can write smut. Any ship in the DCU universe. Any prompts or requests are okay! So are alternate universes or even reader/ some dcu character. Crossovers are fine too. Although I may branch off and create a new fic based on that idea.If everyone could leave their requests under chapter 1 that would be really helpful😀I also have an ATLA & LOK & MCU & Harry Potter & JJK Requests, you can find it in my works.please state if you want smut specifically in your request.

entry.title: Forgive Yourself by Letting Yourself Love (and letting yourself be loved)
entry.summary:
Author: aviationisthere

Summary: When Bruce arrived at the cave, the first thing he heard was yelling. That wasn’t unusual so he didn’t think anything was out of the ordinary. That was until he parked Nightwing’s bike in its spot and he saw his children. He saw his children. They were children. Young children. “What the...” Bruce pulled off the helmet. He got off the bike and set the helmet down before pulling off his cowl. He walked over to the batmobile which his kids were trying to climb out of. “Boys?”•OR just another batfam de-aging au because I love them and I wanted one that had all of my demands so I roped my friend Avian into helping me co-write one!

entry.title: who are you under there?
entry.summary:
Author: bigburger88

Summary: The quiet and reserved Clark Kent had never really been interested in anyone. A series of lucky coincidences and a dangerous mission introduce him to an alluring shadow of a man who does nothing but avoid him. What he doesn’t know is that the man he’s so desperately searching for is Bruce Wayne, the loud asshole on campus who does nothing but bother him.

entry.title: FUEGO, CENIZAS Y FUEGO OTRA VEZ / FIRE, ASHES AND FIRE AGAIN
entry.summary:
Author: WonderWritter

Summary: Las vidas de Jon y Damian se entrelazan cuando se conocen en la universidad, todo es genial en su relación, tanto, que deciden hacer las cosas más formales, lo que no sabían es que su historia no comienza con ellos, sino con las personas que los anteceden.Universo alternativo Clark y Bruce son padres solteros (sin poderes) Viven sus vidas con sus respectivos hijos y con un interesante pasado en común, no sabían que volverían a encontrarse hasta que descubren que sus hijos están enamorados, lo que ellos no saben es que éstos se conocieron mucho antes, y vaya que se conocían muy bien.

entry.title: Ripped to pieces
entry.summary:
Author: Hades107

Summary: He was in the theater again, watching the opera, his eyes automatically drawn to the creatures moving onstage, flying high above the singers before suddenly changing course, swooping down like bats landing upon their prey.The light disappeared, and his screams were drowned out as they tore him to pieces. Bruce gasped, the cold clean air stunk of the same blood that he had drowned in, that had poured from him as he was ripped apart, that was now soaking into the silky restraints that wrapped around him as he thrashed.

entry.title: Leave Me My Shackles
entry.summary:
Author: dumbobigear

Summary: Bruce refuses to confront his mental anguish as he knows it would jeopardize his abilities as a hero. Clark wants nothing more than to help him no matter how often or how firmly he is shut down. All this comes to a head when one day Bruce stumbles into a League meeting looking more bent out of shape than usual. Though he remains stoic for his city's sake, his colleague realizes that the path Bruce is on is not the path of a well man.
